hero.name: Andrey Lebedev
hero.subtitle: I'm a frontend developer
hero.description: I create interfaces you want to use

description.part1: I am a frontend developer with two years of experience, passionate about creating user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing interfaces. I participated in two startups:
description.part2: - a service for automatic resume distribution,
description.part3: - issuing virtual cards. I constantly learn new technologies and tools, strive to grow and solve real problems. I am looking for interesting and useful projects where I can create quality and meaningful products.

calendar.title: Game Calendar
calendar.description: An interactive web app for scheduling games using a calendar layout. Features drag & drop, task creation, image upload, and Firebase sync.

trello.title: Task Planner
trello.description: A task management web app where users can move tasks between columns like To Do, In Progress, Done.

piano.title: Virtual Piano
piano.description: A 3-octave virtual piano with note visualization and keyboard/mouse control support.

horses.title: Four Horses Club
horses.description: Responsive site built from a Figma design using pure JavaScript and OOP. No frameworks.

githubSearch.title: GitHub User Search
githubSearch.description: An interactive GitHub user search app using the GitHub API.

countries.title: Country Catalog
countries.description: A country catalog with region filtering and name search.

footer.description: The design was prototyped in Figma and hand-coded in Visual Studio Code. The site is built with React using Redux Toolkit for state management, written in TypeScript, and styled with SCSS modules. The build is handled by Vite. The project is deployed on Vercel. The source code is available on
